dct_title_s: International Travel Maps Northern Norway & Svalbard : Scale 1:900,000 / 1:800,000 / edited by Yusuke Ujimiya, Mark Ramsay, Tran Dinh Cuong, Edgar Mantashyan, Dung Nguyen, Phuong Vu ; Lan Joyce, editor in chief.
dct_description_sm: Legend shows roads, railways, ferry routes, airports, points of interest, lodging places, and recreation areas. Includes index and lists of top attractions. Relief shown by gradient tints on Svalbard (Spitsbergen) map. Relief shown by spot heights on northern Norway map. Svalbard map oriented with north toward the upper left. Ancillary map on verso: Bear Island. Scale 1:400,000. Title from panel. At head of panel title: International Travel Maps.
